description.value: Once per long rest, when you enter into an agreement that would reasonably be beneficial for at least the other creature, you are bound by your word. You gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die upon completing the agreement without breaking the terms. You lose a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die if you break the terms of the agreement.
